submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n=len(colors)
        colors.extend(colors[:k])
        arr=[]
        for i,c in enumerate(colors):
            arr.append((i+c)%2)
        # print(arr)
        s=sum(arr[:k])
        res=0
        for i in range(n):
            if s==0 or s==k: res+=1
            s+=arr[i+k] - arr[i]
        return res
